english.segment1: I've found a place. Where I can finally be a part of the story. I've been embraced. By the wonderful arms of glory. There is nowhere else I'd rather be
english.segment2: I believe Your spirit is alive and on the move. Oh I want to be caught up in the middle of You. I wanna be a part of what I know you're gonna do. Oh I wanna be caught up in the middle of You
english.segment3: I finally see. The very reason for my existance. I am complete. When I'm standing within Your presence. And now I know where I'm supposed to be
english.segment4: I believe Your spirit is alive and on the move. Oh I want to be caught up in the middle of You. I wanna be a part of what I know you're gonna do. Oh I wanna be caught up in the middle of You
english.segment5: You have called me all along. This is right where I belong. Caught up in You. Caught up in You
english.segment6: I believe Your spirit is alive and on the move. Oh I want to be caught up in the middle of You. I wanna be a part of what I know you're gonna do. Oh I wanna be caught up in the middle of You
english.segment7: Caught up in the middle. Caught up
